subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort was built by Maharaja Jai Singh II?
question_hi: महाराजा जयशिखिनी सी ने किस महत्वपूर्ण फोट बनाया?
explanation_en: Maharaja Jai Singh II is known for building Amber Fort (Amer Fort), which is located in Jaipur. The correct answer should be 'D', referring to Jaipur Fort (Jaipur's famous fort).
explanation_hi: महाराजा जयशिखिनी ने किया जैसाइयां निवासी फोट बना। यहां जयपुर विभाग (जयपुर के अपीनी विभाग), जैसाइयां की बहुती है।
